header.div: What will I learn in this unit?

ol.li: watch a video clip of a candidate expanding her answer to a simple question;
learn why giving reasons for your opinions is very important. Watch candidates answering questions from Phase 3 of the speaking test;
watch a candidate explain how he feels life has changed;
watch the candidate again and decide whether he could have given a clearer, fuller answer to the question. What would you have said?
